title: 20 Minute Everyday Vinyasa Yoga Flow
description:
This is a 20 minute yoga flow perfect for everyday practice. Re-visit whenever you need a quick pick me up. :) 

If you enjoyed this video, be sure to give it a thumbs up and subscribe so you don't miss out on free yoga content.

See you on the mat!

-

DISCLAIMER
The information and practices on this website are not meant to diagnose, treat or cure any illness and and should not be used as a substitute for professional medical care. Please consult with your physician prior to beginning exercise.

channelDescription:
Welcome to the channel! 

I'm Jessica, a 500-hr certified yoga instructor with a passion for health, wellness and sharing mindful movement. I'm here to support you on your yoga journey and give you the tools to live a more balanced and mindful life, both on and off the mat. 

On this channel you will find a variety of classes with different styles, lengths and levels, along with the occasional vlog or sit-down chat.

If you enjoy practicing with me and want more exclusive yoga classes, meditations + courses then check out my app, Jess Yoga - available worldwide for iOS and Android (link below). 

Thank you for practicing with me, and I’ll see you on the mat! 

For business inquiries/collaborations please email richburg.jessica@gmail.com.
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/lZxxH-xNBto" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments:
Hi everyone! Thanks so much for practicing with me and I appreciate all of the feedback. 💕

It takes quite a bit of time to plan, film and edit each class so knowing how I can improve is helpful! My newer classes have improved audio/video sync so be sure to check those out, if this one didn’t suit you. Have a great day!

P.S. this video was filmed in one of my favorite places - Lombok, Indonesia 😊🙏
Jess you’ve become my favorite YouTube yoga instructor! You don’t talk to much, you’re very informative and a great help. Keep up the good work!

YouTube is flooded with yoga classes and I find most instructors talk way too much.  It makes it difficult to immerse yourself in a practice and make it your own with constant talking.  Jessica's minimal cues provide just enough to follow and gives the practice room to breathe. It's perfect.
I like how slow and peaceful this was, no rushing, just soft and calm.
I am a certified yoga teacher - and I can tell that this video is amazing! Very professional! Wonderful voice!!!!
